publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4570 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Edinburgh TreeFest and Wood Market—That the Parliament welcomes this year’s Edinburgh TreeFest and Wood Market; notes that the free festival takes place in Inverleith Park on 18 and 19 July 2009; recognises the exciting programme planned, which includes horse logging, a mountain biking display and a North American Indian exhibition; congratulates the Four Winds Inspiration Centre on organising the event and for the environmental education work that it carries out through the year, and further notes that information on the festival and organisers can be found at www.edinburghtreefest.org.uk. Supported by: David Stewart*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*, Christina McKelvie*
